hero.headline: Contact MPB Health
hero.description: Have questions about health sharing or need help with your account? Our team is here to help. Reach out to us using any of the methods below.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within one business day. For urgent member support needs, please call us directly.

links.title: Member Portal Support
links.description: Get help with your member account, sharing requests, or portal access

links.title: Virtual Care Support
links.description: Technical support for virtual care appointments and consultations

links.title: Billing Questions
links.description: Questions about monthly sharing amounts, payments, or billing

links.title: New Member Enrollment
links.description: Get help with applications, plan selection, or enrollment process

links.title: Group Plans & Employers
links.description: Information about group health sharing plans for employers

links.title: Partnership Opportunities
links.description: Explore partnership opportunities with MPB Health
